author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/resident-evil-requiem/

Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.
 
A new era of survival horror begins when Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27, 2026 for PlayStation®5.

©CAPCOM

#ps5 #ps5games #residentevil #residentevilrequiem
title: Resident Evil Requiem - 2nd Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/gran-turismo-7/

On 8 September 2025(local time), Opel unveiled the Opel Corsa GSE Vision Gran Turismo at the IAA Mobility 2025 international motor show held in Munich. 

The Opel Corsa GSE Vision Gran Turismo combines the iconic Corsa nameplate with the ‘GSE’ sports sub-brand. This all-electric high-performance car combines Opel’s rich motorsport heritage with future-thinking technologies.

Created by Opel, who have a long history stretching back to the dawn of the automobile, this latest Vision Gran Turismo will be added to ‘Gran Turismo 7’ this autumn. The Opel Corsa GSE Vision Gran Turismo is a simultaneous expression of both Opel’s history and future. Look out for it in Gran Turismo 7 soon.

Vision Gran Turismo is a project in which the world’s leading automotive brands design new sports cars for Gran Turismo players. For more information on Vision Gran Turismo, please visit the official Gran Turismo website ( https://www.gran-turismo.com/
title: Gran Turismo 7 - Opel Corsa GSE Vision GT: Unveiled | PS5 & PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/babysteps/

Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other.

Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

Get ready to fall for Nate, in Baby Steps, a literal walking simulator.

#ps5 #ps5games #babysteps
title: Baby Steps - The SeeSaw Awaits | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015287

Gloomy Eyes is a single-player “self-coop” cozy horror adventure set in a Tim Burton-esque world. where you switch between two unique characters. Out now on PS5!

Players will alternate between controlling two unique characters as they embark on a journey to bring sunlight back to a world plunged into nasty, bitter darkness. The game is set in a lovingly haunting visual aesthetic, reminiscent of Corpse Bride and The Nightmare Before Christmas.

There’s no gore or jump scares, just an enchanting, haunting atmosphere and a whimsical tale of forbidden companionship that will tug at your undead heartstrings.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Gloomy Eyes - Available Now Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/EP7449-PPSA21422_00-0178621419327299

The legend enters the pitch. Alessandro Del Piero in @uflgame.Introducing adidas Throwback Team Pass. Co-starring Raphinha and Emiliano Martínez.adidas Throwback team pass brings one of football's iconic legends directly into UFL, alongside legendary retro kits, boots, and a retro 50s-inspired stadium. It doesn't matter if you're chasing Del Piero, or rocking retro kits, or showing off modern adidas gear, this Throwback pass is your chance to own a piece of football history. adidas has shaped football for decades, and now you can bring that legacy into UFL.

#ps5 #ps5games #ufl #adidas
title: UFL - adidas Throwback Team Pass Trailer | PS5 Games
